flack.translation[0].definitions[1].defi: someone whose job is to represent an organization and answer questions about it, especially when something bad has happened
flack.translation[0].definitions[1].exam: They spent millions on lobbyists and flacks to improve their image.
flack.translation[1].definitions[0].defi: a person whose job is to represent an organization and talk to newspaper and television reporters, answering their questions about a negative story involving the organization
flack.translation[1].definitions[0].exam: He put a shield between himself and the press by hiring a flack to handle media calls.
